page.title: 01INTRODUCTION TO THE AREA
page.content: This survey block covers 2/3 of Kingscote Parish and includes the main village built up area. It includes approximately 2/3 of the residences counted in the 1981 census and 2/3 of the voters on the 1985 electoral roll. We estimate from this that the {population}of the study area is in the region of 220. This is a rural parish with one nucleated village and several outlying farms or hamlets of which Calcot, Bagpath, Newington Bagpath and Lasborough were excluded from the study area. Most of the information on pages 5-18 is based on questionaires delivered throughout the study area. 50% of housholders in this area completed a{housing}questionaire and 40% of residents completed a {lifestyles}survey if under ten year olds are excluded.
